data.text: All the flowers of the tomorrows are in the seeds of today
Failure will never overTake me If my determination to suceed is strong enough
Leadership Is The Ability To Get Extraordinary Achievement From Ordinary People
You always pass failure on the way to success
Make each day your masterpiece
An investment in knowledge pays the best dividends
We cannot solve problems with the kind of thinking we employed when we came up with them
Everything comes to you at the right time
Set a goal that makes you want to jump out of bed in the morning
Never give up because great things take time
Challenges are what make life interesting and Overcoming them is what makes life meaningful
Life is not about waiting for the storm to pass but learning to dance in the rain
The sparrow is sorry for the peacock at the burden of its tail
Faith is the bird that feels the light when the dawn is still dark
An investment knowledge pays the best interest
Anger is never without a reason but seldom with a good one
It always seems impossible until its done
Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world
A good head and a good heart are always a formidable combination
All the money you make will never buy back your soul
Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever
If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way
Change your thoughts and you change your world
Always keep your eyes open. Keep watching. Because whatever you see can inspire you
If the plan does not work, change the plan but never the goal
You cannot save people, you can just love them
